scripts.serve: npm run build && npm run export && cd out && serve -p 8080 && cd D:/PROJECTS/app web carllx/digitalart_page
scripts.pushdev: git add . &&  git commit -m   "$npm_package_config_commitmessage"  && git push origin master
scripts.pushpg: npm run build && npm run export && cd out/ && node -e "console.log('now path on :',process.cwd())" && git add . && git commit -m  " %npm_package_config_commitmessage% " && git subtree push --prefix out origin gh-pages
scripts.deploy: rm -rf node_modules/.cache && next build && next export && touch out/.nojekyll && git add out/ && git commit -m "%npm_package_config_commitmessage%" && git subtree push --prefix out origin gh-pages
